## AUTH\_INTERCEPTOR\_CONFIG variable

Token used for injecting custom configuration for AuthInterceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
AUTH_INTERCEPTOR_CONFIG: InjectionToken<AuthInterceptorConfig>
```
